plugin.name: Pkuxkx_Seek
plugin.author: 蛤蟆王子
plugin.description:
bl 曲阜 云游僧人 (bl 区域 搜索关键字） bl off (终止寻找) blcha 曲阜 (查询曲阜区域寻找起始房间位置）
备注： 1、遇到NPC拦路会killall，小号慎用。 2、寻找结束会重新启动拦路组。

trigger.send: if "%1" == "@find_room" then SetVariable("find_npc", "完成") SetVariable("find_room", "完成") print("已到达指定房间。") --Execute("lanluon") end

trigger.match: ^你抬头向上一望，我的妈呀，这么高怎么爬呀？该找个本地人问问。$

trigger.send: if "%1" == "@find_room" then SetVariable("find_npc", "完成") SetVariable("find_room", "完成") print("已到达指定房间。") --Execute("lanluon") end

trigger.match: ^[> ]*藤筐离地面越来越近，终于腾的一声着了地，众人都吁了口长气，悬着的心也随之放了下来。$
trigger.name: bl_dalunsi1

trigger.send: blnpc = nil blnpc = string.find("%1","@find_room") if blnpc ~= nil and "@find_npc" ~= "完成" then SetVariable("find_npc", "完成") SetVariable("find_room", "完成") Execute("follow "..string.lower("%2")) Simulate("\\n提示信息：找到目标！\\n") SendNoEcho("unset brief"); Execute("lanluon") end

trigger.match: ^(大树上|树杈上|崖间古松|古墓墓洞|泉水中|茅厕|湖心小岛) \- .*$
trigger.send: DoAfterSpecial(1, 'SendNoEcho ("response bianli_wait 遍历下一步");SendNoEcho("unresponse bianli_wait");', 12)
SendNoEcho ("response bianli_wait 遍历下一步"); SendNoEcho("unresponse bianli_wait");
SendNoEcho ("answer 送信;n;response bianli_wait 遍历下一步;unresponse bianli_wait")

trigger.match: ^[> ]*(你的动作还没有完成，不能移动。|你逃跑失败。|你小心翼翼往前挪动，遇到艰险难行处，只好放慢脚步。|青海湖畔美不胜收，你不由停下脚步，欣赏起了风景。|吊桥还没有升起来，你就这样走了，可能会给外敌可乘之机的。|你还在山中跋涉，一时半会恐怕走不出这藏边群山！|你还在山中跋涉，一时半会恐怕走不出这六盘山！|你还在山中跋涉，一时半会恐怕走不出这西南地绵绵群山！|\S+几乎没有路了，你走不了那么快。|你一步踏进客房，突觉一股力道奇大的劲风激扑出来，将你一撞，)$
trigger.send: require "wait" wait.make( function() path_bushu = GetVariable("path_bushu") path = utils.split(GetVariable("path_map"),"|") wait.time(1.5) Execute ("halt") Execute (path[tonumber(path_bushu-1)]) end)

trigger.match: ^[> ]*\s*(这里(明显|唯一)的(出口|方向)(有|是).+|这里没有任何明显的.+|浓雾中.+通往.*)$
trigger.send: SendNoEcho ("response bianli_wait 遍历下一步");SendNoEcho("unresponse bianli_wait");

trigger.match: ^[> ]*六名雪山弟子一齐转动机关，吊桥便架在了深谷之上。$
^[> ]*你刚要前行，忽然发现.+决堤，不由暗自庆幸，还好没过去。$
trigger.send: path_bushu = GetVariable("path_bushu") SetVariable ("path_bushu",path_bushu - 1) print("水浸~~水浸~~等待几秒后，自行输入命令jixubl继续前行。")

trigger.match: ^[> ]*只听得轧轧声响，吊桥缓缓放下。$
^[> ]*走到这里，你被壮阔的景色所吸引，向北眺望，正是长江最险峻湍急之处。$
trigger.send: require "wait" wait.make( function() EnableGroup("遍历",0) wait.time(3) EnableGroup("遍历",1) Execute (path[tonumber(path_bushu-1)]) end)

trigger.name: bianli_next
trigger.send: path_bushu = GetVariable("path_bushu") path = utils.split(GetVariable("path_map"),"|") require "wait" wait.make( function() if "@find_npc" == "完成" then EnableGroup ("遍历",0) SendNoEcho("unset brief"); elseif tonumber(GetVariable("path_bushu")) >= tonumber(#path) then EnableGroup ("遍历",0) Execute("lanluon") SendNoEcho("unset brief"); Simulate("\\n提示信息：未找到目标！\\n") print("挖地三尺都没找到嫌疑人，去周边城市碰碰运气吧。") SendNoEcho("response BL_NO_FIND 0"); else if path[tonumber(path_bushu)] == "killall" or path[tonumber(path_bushu)] == "stop" then Execute (path[tonumber(path_bushu)]) print("遍历房间 "..path_bushu.."/"..#path) SetVariable ("path_bushu",path_bushu + 1) SetVariable("roomstop", "@room") EnableGroup("遍历", 0) ResetTimer("bianli_time") EnableTimer("bianli_time", 1) elseif path[tonumber(path_bushu)] == "wait" then Execute (path[tonumber(path_bushu)]) wait.time(5) print("遍历房间 "..path_bushu.."/"..#path) SetVariable ("path_bushu",path_bushu + 1) SendNoEcho ("response bianli_wait 遍历下一步"); SendNoEcho("unresponse bianli_wait"); elseif path[tonumber(path_bushu)] == "wait2" then Execute (path[tonumber(path_bushu)]) wait.time(2) print("遍历房间 "..path_bushu.."/"..#path) SetVariable ("path_bushu",path_bushu + 1) SendNoEcho ("response bianli_wait 遍历下一步") SendNoEcho("unresponse bianli_wait"); else if math.fmod(path_bushu,"30") < 1 then print("防止命令过多，延时1秒") wait.time(1) end Execute (path[tonumber(path_bushu)]) print("遍历房间 "..path_bushu.."/"..#path) SetVariable ("path_bushu",path_bushu + 1) end end end)

alias.send: job_zone = { {"中原","xuchang","许昌城"}, {"曲阜","qufu","孔庙"}, {"信阳","xinyang","小广场"}, {"泰山","taishan","南天门"}, {"长江南岸","cjnab","长江岸边"}, {"长江北岸","cjbw","长江岸边"}, {"黄河南岸","hhna20","黄河南岸"}, {"黄河北岸","hhbw","黄河北岸"}, {"嘉兴","jiaxing","嘉兴城"}, {"泉州","quanzhou","城中心"}, {"江州","jiangzhou","中央广场"}, {"牙山","yashan","牙山湾中心"}, {"临安府","hangzhou","大理寺"}, {"西湖","xhdjq","段家桥"}, {"福州","fuzhou","城中心"}, {"南昌","nanchang","城中心"}, {"镇江","zhenjiang","广场"}, {"苏州","suzhou","宝带桥"}, {"归云庄","guiyunzhuang","归云庄大门"}, {"小山村","xiaocun","打谷场"}, {"张家口","zhangjiakou","广场"}, {"麒麟村","qilincun","小广场"}, {"大理城中","dali","中心广场"}, {"昆明","kunming","中心广场"}, {"平西王府","pingxiwang","平西王府大门"}, {"桃源","taoyuan","桃源县境"}, {"岳阳","yueyang","城中心"}, {"成都","chengdu","总督府门前"}, {"建康府南城","jk","中城"}, {"建康府北城","jk","中城"}, {"北京","beijing","永安门"}, {"康亲王府","beijing","永安门"}, {"天坛","beijing","永安门"}, {"紫禁城","beijing","永安门"}, {"洛阳","luoyang","洛阳中心广场"}, {"灵州","lingzhou","城中心"}, {"晋阳","jinyang","朝曦门内街"}, {"日月神教","riyue","小村庄"}, {"神龙岛","sldmt","码头"}, {"襄阳","xiangyang","城中心"}, {"荆州","xiangyang","城中心"}, {"丝绸之路","sichou","丝绸之路"}, {"长安","changan","朱雀大街"}, {"扬州","yangzhou","中央广场"}, {"杀手帮","yangzhou","中央广场"}, {"丐帮","yangzhou","中央广场"}, {"岳王墓","yuewangmu","墓前小道"}, {"姑苏慕容","qy","码头"}, {"桃花岛","thdht","海滩"}, {"峨嵋","embgsdm","报国寺大门"}, {"天龙寺","tianlongsi","三元宫"}, {"武当山","wudangmen","武当山门"}, {"华山","hsjx","华山脚下"}, {"全真","quanzhen","崇玄台"}, {"古墓","gumu","断龙石"}, {"少林寺","2xu","少林寺"}, {"白驼山","baituo","大门"}, {"星宿","xingxiu","巨岩"}, {"明教","mingjiao","山门"}, {"灵鹫","lingjiu","百丈涧"}, {"凌霄城","lxqt","桥头"}, {"凌霄","lxqt","桥头"}, {"大轮寺","zanpu","赞普广场"}, {"兰州","lanzhoudalu","大路"}, {"无量山","tianlongsi","三元宫"}, {"峨眉后山","emei","千佛庵大殿"}, {"杭州提督府","tidufu","提督府正门"}, {"提督府","tidufu","提督府正门"}, {"天地会","lygcdns","棺材店内室"}, {"湟中","hzh","湟中中心"}, {"西湖梅庄","mzh","客厅"}, {"梅庄很","mzh","客厅"} } for i=1,#job_zone do if job_zone[i][1] == "%1" then print("区域:"..job_zone[i][1].." 节点:"..job_zone[i][2].." 起始房间:"..job_zone[i][3]) break end end --for

area = nil if "%2" ~= nil then SetVariable("find_room", "%2") end if "%1" == "中原" or "%1" == "南阳" or "%1" == "汝州" or "%1" == "许昌" then area = "xuchang" elseif "%1" == "曲阜" then area = "qufu" elseif "%1" == "信阳" then area = "xinyang" elseif "%1" == "泰山" then area = "taishan" elseif "%1" == "长江南岸" or "%1" == "长江" then area = "cjnw" elseif "%1" == "长江北岸" then area = "cjbw" elseif "%1" == "黄河南岸" then area = "hhnw" elseif "%1" == "黄河北岸" then area = "hhbw" elseif "%1" == "嘉兴" then area = "jiaxing" elseif "%1" == "泉州" then area = "quanzhou" elseif "%1" == "江州" then area = "jiangzhou" elseif "%1" == "牙山" then area = "yashan" elseif "%1" == "西湖" then area = "xihu" elseif "%1" == "福州" then area = "fuzhou" elseif "%1" == "南昌" then area = "nanchang" elseif "%1" == "镇江" then area = "zhenjiang" elseif "%1" == "杭州" or "%1" == "临安府" then area = "hangzhou" elseif "%1" == "苏州" then area = "suzhou" elseif "%1" == "归云庄" then area = "guiyunzhuang" elseif "%1" == "小山村" then area = "xiaocun" elseif "%1" == "张家口" then area = "zhangjiakou" elseif "%1" == "麒麟村" then area = "qilincun" elseif "%1" == "大理" or "%1" == "大理城中" then area = "dali" elseif "%1" == "昆明" then area = "kunming" elseif "%1" == "平西王府" or "%1" == "平西" then area = "pingxiwang" elseif "%1" == "桃源" then area = "taoyuan" elseif "%1" == "yueyang" then area = "岳阳" elseif "%1" == "成都" then area = "chengdu" elseif "%1" == "建康府南城" or "%1" == "南城" then area = "jkn" elseif "%1" == "建康府北城" or "%1" == "北城" then area = "jkb" elseif "%1" == "天坛" then area = "tiantan" elseif "%1" == "康亲王府" or "%1" == "康亲" then area = "kangqin" elseif "%1" == "紫禁城" then area = "zijincheng" elseif "%1" == "北京" then area = "beijing" elseif "%1" == "洛阳" then area = "luoyang" elseif "%1" == "灵州" then area = "lingzhou" elseif "%1" == "晋阳" then area = "jinyang" elseif "%1" == "襄阳" or "%1" == "荆州" then area = "xiangyang" elseif "%1" == "丝绸之路" or "%1" == "丝绸" then area = "sc" elseif "%1" == "长安" then area = "changan" elseif "%1" == "姑苏慕容" or "%1" == "慕容" then area = "murong" elseif "%1" == "武当山" or "%1" == "武当" then area = "wudang" elseif "%1" == "天龙寺" or "%1" == "天龙" then area = "tianlong" elseif "%1" == "桃花岛" or "%1" == "桃花" then area = "taohuadao" elseif "%1" == "峨嵋" or "%1" == "峨眉" then area = "emei" elseif "%1" == "明教" then area = "mingjiao" elseif "%1" == "灵鹫" or "%1" == "灵鹫宫" then area = "lingjiu" elseif "%1" == "丐帮" then area = "gaibang" elseif "%1" == "华山" then area = "huashan" elseif "%1" == "凌霄城" or "%1" == "凌霄" or "%1" == "雪山" then area = "lingxiao" elseif "%1" == "大轮寺" then area = "dalunsi" elseif "%1" == "全真" then area = "quanzhen" elseif "%1" == "古墓" then area = "gumu" elseif "%1" == "神龙岛" or "%1" == "神龙" then area = "shenlongdao" elseif "%1" == "星宿" then area = "xingxiu" elseif "%1" == "日月神教" or "%1" == "日月" then area = "riyue" elseif "%1" == "少林" or "%1" == "少林寺" then area = "shaolin" elseif "%1" == "白驼山" or "%1" == "白驼" then area = "baituo" elseif "%1" == "扬州" then area = "yangzhou" elseif "%1" == "岳王墓" then area = "yuewangmu" elseif "%1" == "兰州" or "%1" == "兰州很" then area = "lanzhou" elseif "%1" == "岳阳" then area = "yueyang" elseif "%1" == "杀手帮" then area = "pk" elseif "%1" == "无量山" or "%1" == "无量后山" then area = "wls" elseif "%1" == "峨眉后山" or "%1" == "峨嵋后山" then area = "emeihoushan" elseif "%1" == "杭州提督府" or "%1" == "提督府" then area = "tidufu" elseif "%1" == "天地会" then area = "tiandihui" elseif "%1" == "马贼" then area = "mazei" elseif "%1" == "湟中" then area = "huangzhong" elseif "%1" == "西湖梅庄" or "%1" == "梅庄" or "%1" == "梅庄很" then area = "meizhuang" end if "%1" == "off" then SetVariable("path_map", "") EnableTimer("bianli_time", 0) EnableGroup("遍历",0) print("已终止遍历。") SendNoEcho("unset brief"); Execute("lanluon") elseif area == nil then Execute("lanluon") SendNoEcho("unset brief"); print("骚年：这里是地球，无法查询火星路径。") else SetVariable("path_map", GetVariable("path_"..area)) SetVariable ("path_bushu", 1) SetVariable ("find_npc", "") EnableGroup("遍历",1) Execute("lanluoff") Execute ("set brief 2;look") end

timer.name: bianli_time
timer.send:
path_bushu = GetVariable("path_bushu") path = utils.split(GetVariable("path_map"),"|")
if GetVariable("room") == GetVariable("roomstop") then Execute (path[tonumber(path_bushu)]) print("遍历房间 "..path_bushu.."/"..#path) Execute ("look") else print("遍历房间 "..path_bushu.."/"..#path) SetVariable ("path_bushu",path_bushu + 1) EnableTimer("bianli_time", 0) EnableGroup("遍历", 1) Execute ("look") end

variables.variable: s|se|nw|sw|n|s|sw|s|sw|l up|ne|se|sw|ne|nw|n|ne|ne|n|w|w|w|w|n|n|n|n|n|n|n|n|n|n|n|n|n|ne|nw|se|e|e|e|e|e|s|s|s|s|e|ne|n|n|break men;n|n|w|e|e|w|n|n|s|s|s|s|s|s|sw|w|s|s|s|s|s|s|s|w|w|w|w|w|u|w|w|w|n|n|n|n|n|n|n|ne|ne|e|e|e|s|s|s|s|s|s|s|s|w|w|w|e|e|e|n|n|n|n|w|d|w|w|s|n|w|n|n|n|n|s|s|s|s|w|n|s|w|n|s|se|nw|sw|ne|w|w|s|s|s|e|nw|se|n|u|d|s|sw|ne|s|s|w|e|e|w|n|l up|n|se|u|d|nw|ne|ne|se|s|w|w|e|s|w|e|e|e|n|e|w|w|n|e|s|sw|ne|n|e|s|w|e|s|nw|se|n|n|n|n|w|w|killall|w|n|s|w|l north|l west|e|e|e|e|n|e|n|s|w|n|w|s|n|enter|out|n|n|u|d|n|u|d|s|e|n|l north|s|s|l south|n|e|e|n;ask shiwei jiaotou about 投军|stop|n|n|s|s|s|w|w|w|w|s|l south|n|w|n|w|n|s|s|n|w|n|s|s|n|w|e|e|e|s|w|n|s|s|w|e|e|w|s|e|w|s|w|e|e|w|se|s|n|nw|s|u|nw|s|s|s|s|e|e|e|d|

n|nw|se|e|stop|do 10 e|e|w|nu|nu|eu|n|nu|n|n|nu|eu|n|nu|nu|nu|wu|nu|n|w|n|s|s|n|w|e|e|e|ne|w|n|ne|se|s|nw|s|sw|w|n|n|enter|n|stop|do 8 l light;push light;n|nd|su|push light|s|w|wu|w|w|w|wu|n|n|w|e|e|w|n|s|s|s|w|e|s|n|ed|e|e|e|ed|e|out|s|s|s|sd|ed|sd|sd|sd|s|wd|sd|s|s|sd|se|e|w|n|n|open door;n|n|s|climb down|climb up|s|s|s|nw|s|wd|sd|sd|w|stop|do 7 w|s|

s|s|s|s|su|wu|wu|n|n|n|w|n|s|e|ask liang about 拜山;n|nu|wu|n|w|s|n|n|s|w|n|s|nw|n|n|s|s|sd|se|s|n|nw|nu|se|e|e|n|look north|s|e|look north|look south|e|s|w|e|e|w|s|s|n|n|n|ed|ed|ed|wu|wu|wu|n|s|w|s|nu|nu|wu|eu|wu|

s|w|e|e|look up|w|s|w|e|s|w|e|e|w|s|s|s|s|e|w|s|s|s|s|s|se|killall|s|w|e|e|w|n|nw|n|n|n|n|e|e|e|n|n|n|n|se|e|e|w|w|nw|e|n|s|w|eu|e|eu|wd|w|wd|w|w|s|n|w|n;ask nvyong about 郭大侠|n|w|e|s|s|sw|s|e|w|w|e|n|ne|w|n|s|w|w|n|s|s|n|w|n|s|s|s|n|n|w|w|w|w|n|n;ask cun gu about 白雕;killall tufei tou|wait|s|s|w|w|w|w|w|n|s|w|w|e|e|e|e|u|u|u|halt;d|zuan dong|out|d|d|s|s|s|e|e|e|n|n|n|n|n|n|n|n|n|e|w|n|e|w|w|n|look up|s|e|n|w|e|e|e|w|w|n|n|n|w|w|w|w|s|s|s|n|n|n|e|e|e|e|n|n|n|n|n|killall;n|l north|

w|n|s|s|n|w|w|n|s|s|n|e|e|e|n|w|e|e|n|s|s|n|w|n|w|e|n|n|w|e|n|ne|sw|s|s|s|e|e|e|e|l enter|w|s|w|e|s|w|e|s|w|w|s|n|w|n|s|e|n|enter|n|n|s|w|e|e|w|s|out|s|e|e|e|e|e|e|ne|e|ne|sw|w|sw|w|w|w|s|sw|w|w|e|s|s|n|n|se|nw|sw|u|d|w|w|enter|out|s|s|n|w|sw|ne|nw|n|say 红花老祖本姓朱 为救苍生下凡来;enter|n|s|out|s|se|e|e|e|w|s|e|w|w|n|s|s|l west|n|e|s|w|sw|u|d|w|e|se|e|e|n|s|w|s|su|wu|ed|nd|w|e|n|w|n|e|n|n|n|nw|

sd|e|w|sd|e|w|w|e|nw|nw|n|w|sw|ne|e|s|se|se|se|e|n|s|e|n|s|s|n|se|e|l north|l east|l south|w|wait|do 5 drink skin;nw|w|w|nw|nu|nu|n|l west|nu|n|e|w|ne|e|w|sw|n|n|e|e|ne|sw|w|w|n|e|e|w|w|s|w|move pen;d;move pen;d|u|e|s|s|w|n|s|s|n|w|w|n|w|w|nd|nd|nw|ne|nw|nw|w|sw|w|sw|w|nw|n|s|se|e|ne|e|ne|nw|w|nw|nw|sw|ne|ne|nw|se|l east|sw|se|se|e|se|e|ne|e|se|ne|nw|ne|nw|w|ne|nu|sd|sw|l southwest|e|se|sw|sw|w|sw|se|se|sw|se|su|su|e|s|e|e|e|s|sd|s|

e|n|s|s|e|w|n|e|n|s|e|s|n|e|e|n|s|ne|sw|se|nw|w|w|w|w|w|s|e|e|w|w|s|e|w|s|e|w|s|s|sw|l southdown|ne|se|nw|n|n|n|w|nw|ask punk about 王小二;se|e|n|n|nw|sw|ne|nw|ne|enter hole|w|sw|w|n|s|nw|nw|se|se|e|se|se|

n|n|s|w|e|e|w|s|w|w|e|e|s|w|e|e|w|open gate;s|ne|nw|n|s|se|ne|ne|sw|sw|sw|knock gate 4;knock gate 2;knock gate 5;knock gate 3|n|

muclient.script:
function Fun_CHNum(str) if (#str % 2) ==1 then return 0 end result=0 wan=1 unit=1 for i=#str -2 ,0,-2 do char=string.sub(str,i+1,i+2) if (char=="十") then unit=10*wan if (i==0) then result=result+unit elseif CH_NUM[string.sub(str,i-1,i)]==nil then result=result+unit end elseif (char=="百") then unit=100*wan elseif (char=="千") then unit=1000*wan elseif (char=="万") then unit=10000*wan wan=10000 else if CH_NUM[char]~=nil then result=result+CH_NUM[char]*unit end end end return result end
CH_NUM = { ["一"] = 1, ["二"] = 2, ["三"] = 3, ["四"] = 4, ["五"] = 5, ["六"] = 6, ["七"] = 7, ["八"] = 8, ["九"] = 9, }
